title: The Daily Show
brief_description: During the time of the protests, many late night TV shows reported on the protests, including The Daily Show while Jon Stewart was host. During the segment, Samantha Bee took a humourous approach and satirised participants.

constellations_other.name: Fight for your right
constellations_other.description: Real world revolution and the fictional representations that reflect the struggle for equality in the past, present and dystopian future.
